video_prompt: **Prompt:** Iridescent hair shimmers and shifts colors (light green, blue, purple). Eyes subtly dilate and eyelashes flutter. A gentle, subtle smile slowly forms and fades. Background elements subtly appear and dissolve.
image_prompt:
**Prompt:**

Anime portrait of a young person with iridescent white hair (light green, blue, purple glitter), fair skin, large lavender eyes, delicate nose, and soft pink lips. Focus on upper body, slender neck, and luminous lighting on face and collarbones. Dark, out-of-focus background. Ethereal, fantastical style.
refined_video_prompt: Iridescent hair dynamically shifts through a spectrum of colors. Eyes subtly dilate as lashes gently flutter. A soft smile slowly forms, then gradually recedes. Background elements fluidly materialize and vanish.
